targets.expr:
topk(
  5,
  100 *
  sum by (node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="", image!=""})
  /
  max by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"})
)

topk(
  5,
  100 *
  sum by (node) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="", image!=""}[5m]))
  /
  max by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"})
)

{job="k8s-audit", node=~"$node"}
| json verb="verb", stage="stage",
       user="user.username",
       ns="objectRef.namespace",
       res="objectRef.resource",
       code="responseStatus.code",
       uri="requestURI",
       ua="userAgent"
| stage="ResponseComplete"
| code >= 300
| line_format "code={{.code}} verb={{.verb}} user={{.user}} ns={{.ns}} res={{.res}} uri={{.uri}} ua={{.ua}}"
